name: Frog'em All (Aromx27)
description:
Controls:

  • Move: W(Up),S(Down),A(Left),D(Right)
  • Aim: Right Click.
  • Shoot: LeftClick(While aiming only)
  • Change Weapon:  Mouse wheel scroll
  • Throw Granade: F.

Objective: Defeat all enemies in the level or defeat the boss.

Credits

  • Andrés Mora : Main Programming, Game Design.
  • Agustin Torres: Game Design, Level Design, Programming  Supporter.
  • Julian Echandi: 3D Modelling,UI Art,Menus Screen Art, Game Design.
  • Cristofer Chavarria: Art Supporter, Game Design.
